Reborn:DredgeKey.DESCRIPTION: To #yDredge X, return X cards from your discard pile to your hand.

Reborn:NecroticKey.DESCRIPTION: Necrotic cards are not shuffled into your draw pile once discarded.

Reborn:UndeathKey.DESCRIPTION: Wnen you become undead, your #yShroud is converted to HP, your HP is converted to #yBlock, and you begin to rot. At the start of each turn, gain access to a powerful buff for the rest of combat.

Reborn:RotKey.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, deals 1 damage for each turn spent rotting.

Reborn:ShroudKey.DESCRIPTION: Stacks of Shroud are consumed and converted to max HP when you beome undead.
